Hi Quang,
I will re-open the issue once the following has been provided:
- Crash log
- A reproducible test case
- Android version, emulator and/or device
It would also speed things up if you tried it on 2.1.3 GA/2.1.4 GA (Help -> Check for Titanium SDK Updates, change SDK in tiapp.xml).
Thanks!

I've set this to resolved so that the issue can now be edited to provide more info. We appreciate your time in helping to improve our platform.

Thanks,
Daniel
